TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit OperatingSystem extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class OperatingSystem Implements ICloneable, ISerializable
public ref class OperatingSystem sealed : ICloneable, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable
type OperatingSystem = class interface ICloneable interface ISerializable

summary.span: 表示有关操作系统的信息，如版本和平台标识符。

span.span: Represents information about an operating system, such as the version and platform identifier.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类包含有关操作系统的信息。The class contains information about an operating system. 有关当前运行时操作系统的信息, 请检索 由属性返回的对象。For information about the current runtime operating system, retrieve the object returned by the property. 有关 和属性和方法返回的 windows 操作系统版本及其相应版本号的列表, 请参阅 Windows 开发人员中心上的[操作系统版本](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724832.aspx)。For a list of Windows operating system versions and their corresponding version numbers returned by the and properties and the method, see [Operating System Version](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724832.aspx) on the Windows Dev Center. 按照设计, 类并不是描述操作系统的常规用途, 不能从类中派生更多的非独占类型。By design, the class is not a general purpose means of describing an operating system, and you cannot derive a more inclusive type from the class. 如果需要一个类型来包含有关操作系统的其他信息, 请创建自己的类型, 然后包括类型的字段以及所需的任何其他字段、属性或方法。If you need a type to contain other information about an operating system, create your own type, then include a field of type and any additional fields, properties, or methods that you require. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用对象显示有关运行时操作系统的信息。The following code example uses the object to display information about the runtime operating system. [!code-csharp[System.Environment.OSVersion#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.osversion/cs/osinfo1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Environment.OSVersion#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.osversion/vb/osinfo1.vb#1)]

span.span: One of the values that indicates the operating system platform.

param.name: version
param.span: 对象，指示操作系统的版本。

span.span: A object that indicates the version of the operating system.

summary.span: 使用指定的平台标识符值和版本对象来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the specified platform identifier value and version object.
is .
is not a enumeration value.

para.span: 如果使用类检索有关运行时操作系统的信息, 则不应调用此构造函数来实例化对象。

span.span: If you are using the class to retrieve information about the runtime operating system, you should not call this constructor to instantiate an object.

para.span: 相反, 您可以 从属性中检索描述操作系统的对象。

span.span: Instead, you can retrieve an object that describes the operating system from the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ServicePack As String
public: property System::String ^ ServicePack { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取此 对象表示的 Service Pack 版本。

span.span: Gets the service pack version represented by this object.

value.span: 如果支持 Service Pack 并至少安装了一个 Service Pack，则为该 Service Pack 版本；否则为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The service pack version, if service packs are supported and at least one is installed; otherwise, an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks Service Pack 用于为安装它的操作系统分发软件更新。A service pack is used to distribute software updates for the operating system on which it is installed. 但是, 并非每个操作系统都使用 service pack。However, not every operating system uses service packs. Service Pack 版本 (如果可用) 已正确格式化以便显示。The service pack version, if available, is already correctly formatted for display. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了属性。The following code example demonstrates the property. [!code-cpp[OperatingSystem.ServicePack#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/OperatingSystem.ServicePack/CPP/sp.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[OperatingSystem.ServicePack#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/OperatingSystem.ServicePack/CS/sp.cs#1)] [!code-vb[OperatingSystem.ServicePack#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/OperatingSystem.ServicePack/VB/sp.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取标识操作系统的 对象。

span.span: Gets a object that identifies the operating system.

value.span: 对象，描述操作系统的主版本号、次版本号、内部版本号和修订版本号。

span.span: A object that describes the major version, minor version, build, and revision numbers for the operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请参阅 Windows 开发人员中心上的[操作系统版本](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724832.aspx), 了解 windows 操作系统版本及其相应版本号。See [Operating System Version](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724832.aspx) on the Windows Dev Center for a list of Windows operating system versions and their corresponding version numbers. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建几个对象, 并显示每个对象的属性。The following code example creates several objects and displays the property for each. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VersionString As String
public: property System::String ^ VersionString { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取平台标识符、版本和当前安装在操作系统上的 Service Pack 的连接字符串表示形式。

span.span: Gets the concatenated string representation of the platform identifier, version, and service pack that are currently installed on the operating system.

value.span: 、 和 属性的返回值的字符串表示形式。

span.span: The string representation of the values returned by the , , and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下, 返回的值与方法返回的值相同。By default, the value returned by is the same as the value returned by the method. 但是, 为不同平台实现 .NET Framework 可能会为该平台返回更合适的字符串。However, an implementation of the .NET Framework for a different platform might return a more appropriate string for that platform. 请参阅 Windows 开发人员中心上的[操作系统版本](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724832.aspx), 了解 windows 操作系统版本及其相应版本号。See [Operating System Version](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724832.aspx) on the Windows Dev Center for a list of Windows operating system versions and their corresponding version numbers. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了属性。The following code example demonstrates the property.
